name: Newly Abridged Happiness Manual, Vol II

metadata.name: 4 AM-Newly Abridged Happiness Manual, Vol II
metadata.description:
4 AM is a still from Newly Abridged Happiness Manual, Vol II,  a conceptual poem which continues award-winning poet Ana Mar√≠a Caballero's explorations of the evolution of thought along the vast axis of time. 

Our emotional states are underpinned by the unspoken words that traverse our minds. To examine these words is to examine the intimate scaffolding that sustains our outward-facing selves. 

This 24-part poem does so with humor, compassion, and straightforward honesty, highlighting the mundane, transcendental and contradictory nature of thought.

This is an Expansion Item for Forever Supper, the biggest cryptoart collaboration. Claim your free Core and customise it with the Expansions you collect here: https://async.market/dynamic-blueprints/63fe742c74e62000a8cf7bb8/async-forever-supper
